name: Drawn Story
description: Play as an artist looking at a painted world. You're able to create new items in this world by simply drawing them. Use your own imagination to lead a stickman character through a variety of puzzles by drawing things he can use. Thereâ€™s always a few ways to solve each puzzle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1,4 GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: with OpenGL 2.0 support Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Playing with a touchpad is not recommended! Please use a mouse or a touchscreen
